DOC.brief_summary: After a wash-out (1 to 2 weeks), and 2 to 4 week single-blind placebo run-in period, eligible patients will be randomized to receive lisinopril 10 mg, aliskiren 75 mg, 150 mg or 300 mg for a period of 8 weeks
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study to Assess Efficacy and Safety of Aliskiren in the Elderly With High Blood Pressure
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients with at least 65 yearsold Patients with essential hypertension Exclusion Criteria Severe hypertension History or evidence of a secondary form of hypertension History of Hypertensive encephalopathy or cerebrovascular accident. Other protocoldefined inclusion exclusion criteria also apply.
